What are application questions for the s: Please upload current SFSU unofficial transcript., One letter of recommendation from a SF State faculty member or community service partner/supervisor, attesting to your strengths and your contribution to the public good, Please describe how you have served the public good by discussing EITHER of the following prompts: If you have taken a Community Service Class (CSL), how did you serve the public good through your community placement? What was valuable for you? How might what you learned impact your future learning or work? OR, if you have not taken a CSL class, what work have you engaged in that contributes to the public good in your community? What was valuable for you in doing this work? How might what you learned impact your future learning or work? 150 words or less, Please provide a personal statement about your background, interests, activism and/or anything else that you think we should know about you. 150 words or less

What is the name of this scholarship?: Professor Karen Johnson-Brennan Scholarship Fund in Nursing
What is the class level for this scholar: Undergrad: Upper Division (Junior/Senior), 2nd BA; Grad: Masters
What are application questions for the s: Please provide personal statement that includes service to the community; Please write a statement of financial aid.

What is the name of this scholarship?: Dorothy L. Davis Endowed Memorial Scholarship in Nursing, The
What are application questions for the s: Please write a statement of financial aid. Why do you need this scholarship? (One page maximum).

What is the class level for this scholar: Undergrad: Any; Grad/Post BAC: Masters/PhD/EdD/2nd BA/Credential
What are application questions for the s: Please use 250-400 words to tell us how the scholarship can help (1) your studies in business, education, OR nursing and (2) you achieve your career goals? To ensure the scholarship committee can access your file, please upload your file as Word Document (.doc) or an Adobe PDF file (.pdf). Please upload a copy of your latest transcript. An unofficial transcript is acceptable.

What is the name of this scholarship?: Christy Kearney Award in Nursing & Holistic Health Scholarship
What is the major needed for this schola: Multiple: Nursing (Non-RN)-BS, Nursing ( CCSF )-SB, Nursing (San Mateo)-SB, Nursing (Non-RN)-MS, Nursing ( ACC Entry Level)-MS
What is the class level for this scholar: Undergrad: Sophomore, Junior, Senior, 2nd BA; Grad: N/A
What are application questions for the s: Please write a statement that demonstrates your interest in community service with the underserved and/or in holistic health. The written statement should focus on: a) a detailed description of community service particularly with the underserved, b) experience and relevant coursework in holistic health, and c) type and setting of nursing expected to be practiced.
